dct_title_s:
Africa. Ex magna orbis terre deſcriptione Gerardi Mercatoris deſumta
          studio & induſtria G.M. Iunioris
dct_description_sm:
Appears in: Atlas sive, Cosmographicae meditationes de fabrica mundi et fabricati figura
        (1595)

Atlas first published in 1569. Map issued in several editions and in many languages.
        Includes Latin text on back of map. The cartouche is circular, surrounded by decorative
        scrolls and two satyrs.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Dr. Oscar I. Norwich collection of maps of Africa and its islands, 1486 - ca. 1865 courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
